gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 127, Lakers 116
gameRecap.excerpt: Kawhi Leonard records his 2nd career triple double (25 points, 11 rebounds, 10 assists) to lead the Clippers over the Lakers, 127-116.  James Harden added 23 points and 10 assists in the victory, while D'Angelo Russell (27 points, five rebounds, 10 assists) and Anthony Davis (26 points, 12 rebounds) combined for 53 points for the Lakers in the losing effort.  The Clippers improve to 28-14 on the season, while the Lakers fall to 22-23.
